snippet: Jessica Morgan, most recently the curator of international art at the Tate Modern, will have fund-raising responsibilities as Dia’s director, including for a new Manhattan building.
abstract: Dia Art Foundation announces Jessica Morgan as its new director; Morgan will take helm of organization that is struggling to re-establish its presence in changed Manhattan that has become far more crowded and expensive.
lead_paragraph: Jessica Morgan, most recently the curator of international art at the Tate Modern, will have fund-raising responsibilities as Dia’s director, including for a new Manhattan building.

headline.main: Dia Art Foundation Appoints a Tate Modern Curator as Its Director
headline.print_headline: Dia Art Foundation Appoints a Tate Modern Curator as Its Director
